alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 5:48AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Surf From Utqiagvik East Through Saturday... Northwest winds gusting to 30 mph are occuring along the Arctic Coast near Utqiagvik and causing elevated surf there. Winds near Utqiagvik will turn west tonight and continue into Friday, then gradually decrease Friday night into Saturday. The elevated surf at Utqiagvik will continue into Friday night then gradually decrease on Saturday. Utqiagvik can expect minor beach erosion through Friday night. West winds gusting to 30 mph will develop along the Arctic Coast from Nuiqsut east this morning and continue into Saturday. This will cause elevated surf to develop today along the Arctic Coast from Nuiqsut east and continue into Saturday. Winds and surf are from Nuiqsut east expected to decrease Saturday night. The Arctic Coast from Nuiqsut east can expect minor beach erosion through Saturday.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast
